chunks.zh: 大伙烦躁，心里不得劲儿的时候都怎么排解或发泄的
chunks.en: How do you guys relieve or vent when you are upset and feeling down?

chunks.zh: 心里烦躁的时候听一些重金属乐反而能平静下来是怎么个事？
chunks.en: How is it that listening to heavy metal music can calm me down when I'm feeling irritable?

chunks.zh: 另外求个类似的歌单，兄弟们给推荐推荐。
chunks.en: Also, I'm looking for a similar playlist, brothers, please recommend some.

chunks.zh: 大家别笑话我 我一般都是撸一发
chunks.en: Don't laugh at me, everyone. I usually just fap.

chunks.zh: https://v2ex.com/t/1013623
chunks.en: https://v2ex.com/t/1013623

chunks.zh: jable.tvhanime1.com从三次元到二次元都有你自己选吧
chunks.en: jable.tvhanime1.com has everything from 3D to 2D, choose for yourself.

chunks.zh: 找个失足妇女交流一下心得体会。
chunks.en: Find a prostitute to exchange experiences with.

chunks.zh: 李志的现场演出录像。youtube 可以看。
chunks.en: Li Zhi's live performance videos. You can watch them on YouTube.

chunks.zh: july 的纯音乐
chunks.en: July's instrumental music.

chunks.zh: 每天中午洗脸刷牙，有空去商场看美女，看见抱东西的马上冲上去开门。
chunks.en: Wash your face and brush your teeth every noon, go to the mall to see beautiful women when you have time, and rush to open the door when you see someone carrying things.

chunks.zh: @ash1n2 活捉一位 B 友
chunks.en: @ash1n2 Caught a B friend.

chunks.zh: 重金属的话，推荐 babymetal ，不过我比较喜欢早期的歌曲，组合换人之后就没那个味儿了
chunks.en: For heavy metal, I recommend Babymetal, but I prefer the early songs. It's not the same after the lineup changed.

chunks.zh: 闻女朋友的脚，我 TM 暴风吸入
chunks.en: Smell my girlfriend's feet, I f***ing inhale like a storm.

chunks.zh: 找个嫩模发泄一下
chunks.en: Find a young model to vent with.

chunks.zh: 来一发。。。
chunks.en: Have a fap...

chunks.zh: 跑步、游泳
chunks.en: Running, swimming.

chunks.zh: 闻脚丫，扣肚脐眼
chunks.en: Smell the feet, pick the navel.

chunks.zh: 学学隔壁的兄弟闻女朋友 jiojio ，扣扣肚脐眼
chunks.en: Learn from the brother next door, smell his girlfriend's feet, and pick his navel.

chunks.zh: 去知乎、贴吧、B 站搜引战话题(情感、夫妻情感、彩礼、政治、太空、电车等)，看乐子，看别人吵架，只能看不能插话，时不时代入自己，这时候心情就跟在战场上打胶一样，就是浪费时间
chunks.en: Go to Zhihu, Tieba, and Bilibili to search for topics that incite wars (emotions, couple emotions, betrothal gifts, politics, space, electric vehicles, etc.), watch the fun, watch others quarrel, you can only watch but not interrupt, and substitute yourself from time to time. At this time, the mood is like masturbating on the battlefield, it's just a waste of time.

chunks.zh: B 站听刑事案件：英大吉、大佬 K 、元宝等等总之就是转移自己的注意力
chunks.en: Listen to criminal cases on Bilibili: Ying Daji, Big K, Yuanbao, etc. In short, just divert your attention.

chunks.zh: 跑步 做剧烈运动吃，吃，吃
chunks.en: Running, doing strenuous exercise, eating, eating, eating.

chunks.zh: 《如瓮》 - 石岩《黑白色(live)》 - 麻园诗人 Fall Out Boy 的歌《瞎子(贵州话)》 - 尧十三
chunks.en: 《Like a Jar》 - Shi Yan, 《Black and White (live)》 - Mayuan Poet, Fall Out Boy's songs, 《Blind Man (Guizhou dialect)》 - Yao Shisan.

chunks.zh: 最近正好看了一本后浪出版的《图文小百科：重金属音乐》 https://book.douban.com/subject/36211984/#review  ，里面介绍了不少重金属乐队，看的过程中顺带用 appl e music 搜了几个听，感觉不错，挺躁。
chunks.en: I recently read a book published by Houlang, "The Illustrated Encyclopedia: Heavy Metal Music" https://book.douban.com/subject/36211984/#review, which introduces many heavy metal bands. While reading it, I also searched for a few to listen to on Apple Music, and it felt good and quite energetic.

chunks.zh: 有人在网易云整理了一个歌单：分享灼见泽白的歌单《（比）雅克·德·皮埃尔庞《重金属音乐》》 http://163cn.tv/ri4lK3 (@网易云音乐)
chunks.en: Someone has compiled a playlist on NetEase Cloud: Share Zhuojian Zebai's playlist 《(Compared to) Jacques de Pierrepont 《Heavy Metal Music》》 http://163cn.tv/ri4lK3 (@NetEase Cloud Music)

chunks.zh: 去贴吧微博做喷子
chunks.en: Go to Tieba and Weibo and be a keyboard warrior.
